meanings.definition: A list of people who have recently died, typically found in a newspaper or online.
meanings.sent1: The local newspaper published the necrologies of those who passed away last week.
meanings.sent2: I always read the necrologies in the online obituary section to pay my respects.
meanings.sent3: Looking through the necrologies, I noticed a humorous typo in one of the names listed.
meanings.sent4: The necrologies read like a somber roll call of those who have left us.
meanings.sent5: The necrologies painted a poignant picture of the community's losses.

meanings.definition: The study or writing of obituaries or biographies of deceased individuals.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for necrologies led her to pursue a career in journalism focusing on obituaries.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to necrologies, showcasing the life stories of notable figures.
meanings.sent3: In a strange twist of fate, he found himself immersed in the world of necrologies after winning a writing contest.
meanings.sent4: She approached the task of writing necrologies with the precision of a skilled biographer.
meanings.sent5: The art of crafting necrologies requires a delicate balance of respect and storytelling.
